snippet: At least six officials are the subjects of a criminal investigation, substantially broadening a case that has led to accusations against Senator John L. Sampson.
abstract: Federal prosecutors say at least six elected officials who were secretly recorded by Shirley L Huntley, former state senator from Queens, are now subjects of criminal investigation, broadening case that has already led to allegations against New York State Sen John L Sampson;  prosecutors argue court papers filed in corruption case against Huntley should remain under seal but Judge Jack B Weinstein orders documents unsealed.
lead_paragraph: At least six officials are the subjects of a criminal investigation, substantially broadening a case that has led to accusations against Senator John L. Sampson.

headline.seo: Corruption Case to Add Six More Taped Officials
headline.main: Inquiry Adds 6 Officials Taped by Ex-Legislator
headline.print_headline: Inquiry Adding 6 Officials Taped By Ex-Legislator
